title: Develop Black Sky Restoration Plan
description: A system planner is developing a restoration plan for a 'black sky' event (e.g., a major cyberattack or EMP) that causes a widespread, long-duration blackout.

tasks.description: Identify the utility's 'black start' capable power plants, which can start up without external power.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner identifies three power plants with black start capability.

tasks.description: Develop a cranking path plan, which is a sequence for re-energizing transmission lines and other power plants step-by-step from the black start units.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner creates a detailed, sequential restoration plan.

tasks.description: Identify critical loads (hospitals, water treatment plants, etc.) that should be prioritized during restoration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner creates a prioritized list of critical infrastructure to be restored first.
